name: Blended Peach Cream
description: This recipe for Blended Peach Creams, excerpted from Margaritas, Mojitos, & More, is the perfect treat for a hot summer afternoon. Fresh peaches, nectar, milk, and cream are blended into a whimsical beverage reminiscent of that favorite ice cream truck dessert.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the ingredients in a blender. Blend until completely smooth. Pour into a chilled Collins glass.
